summary: Project to be made responsive and feasible across mobile, tablet (iPad), and laptop/desktop devices.
architectural_notes: Implement responsive layout with defined breakpoints for mobile/tablet/desktop and test across common viewport sizes.

existing_features.title: Ensure the entire frontend layout is responsive and usable across common breakpoints (mobile, tablet/iPad, laptop/desktop), with no horizontal scrolling or clipped content on any page (Home, About, Menu, Offers, Contact, and Menu Management).

Adjust the header navigation and header contents to be responsive at mobile/tablet/desktop sizes, including appropriate spacing, wrapping behavior, and avoidance of overflow for the brand name, search bar, and nav actions.

Make key page grids/sections responsive, especially the Home page hero, cuisine card grid, and any multi-column sections, so that typography scales and layout transitions cleanly from single-column (mobile) to multi-column (tablet/desktop).
Make the Menu Management page responsive, including the tab list, forms, and action buttons, so it remains usable on mobile and tablet (no tabs or form inputs extending off-screen).
Verify and refine footer responsiveness so its grid collapses appropriately on smaller devices and maintains readable spacing and alignment for contact and social sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure responsive, cross-device compatibility (mobile, iPad/tablet, laptop/desktop).

projectName: Make the frontend fully responsive across mobile, tablet (iPad), and desktop
